alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 11 at 5:39AM PST until November 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 12 and 18 inches above 4500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Washington Pass * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads above 4500 feet will become snow covered and hazardous. Low visibilities are likely due to falling and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Through late morning Washington Pass could see an inch an hour snow accumulations. Stevens Pass will see much less snow with the current forecast calling for 1 to 4 inches of snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
